strapiPost.title: Arkansas Filmmakers To Screen Feb. 25 At The Walton Arts Center
strapiPost.content:
The 2022 Fayetteville Film Fest (FFF) is rolling and has quite a bit more to offer as the Festival continues.

  • Local stories: This Friday, Feb. 25, will mark the 2nd part of 4 weekends for the film festival, and the theme is Arkansas Filmmakers. The screening will be at 7p and will feature narrative and documentary films, showcasing the filmmaking talent across Arkansas. 
  • Watch: The titles of the 5 films for Friday’s screening along with their directors and a plot snippet have been released on the WAC’s website. The films all explore themes of disconnection and grief as well as renewed connection and healing. The next screenings of the FFF will be on March 12 and May 26. 

For more info and tickets, click HERE.
